snippet: Ryan Lochte will go for two gold medals in swimming on Thursday, while Mary Whipple and the United States rowing team are favored to win another gold in the women's eight event.
abstract: Ryan Lochte will go for two gold medals in swimming on Thursday, while Mary Whipple and the United States rowing team are favored to win another gold in the women's eight event.

headline.main: What We're Watching: Two Golds in 31 Minutes?
